author: Scott Calvert
title: Shooting Reported at Maryland High School
text:
GREAT MILLS, Md.—A shooting at a Maryland high school Tuesday left the shooter, a student, dead and two others injured in what authorities said may have been a targeted attack, just over a month after a Florida school shooting sparked national demonstrations.
This latest shooting comes as students and activists prepare for “March for Our Lives” rallies nationwide Saturday to demand action on gun control and school safety in response to the Feb. 14 shooting in Parkland, Fla., in which 17 people were killed.
... RELATED VIDEO 20 Years of School Shootings Since 1998, there have been more than a dozen shootings at kindergarten, elementary, middle and high schools that resulted in multiple deaths. These are some of the victims.
